content: परिच्छिद् {c7c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To tear, cut off, tear to pieces. {@--2@} To wound, mutilate. {@--3@} To separate, divide, part; शतेन परिच्छिद्य <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--4@} To fix accurately, set limits to, define, decide, distinguish or discriminate; मध्यस्था भगवती नौ गुणदोषतः परिच्छेत्तुमर्हति <ls>M. 1</ls>; (न) यशः परिच्छेत्तुमियत्तयालं <ls>R. 6. 77</ls>; <ls n="R.">17. 59</ls>; <ls>Ku. 2. 58.</ls> {@--5@} To avert, obviate, remedy.
